snippet: President Obama took on the budget proposals of Mitt Romney and Representative Paul D. Ryan at a campaign stop in New Hampshire, accusing the Republican ticket of seeking to cut trillions of dollars in taxes for the wealthy while raising taxes for...
abstract: President Obama took on the budget proposals of Mitt Romney and Representative Paul D. Ryan at a campaign stop in New Hampshire, accusing the Republican ticket of seeking to cut trillions of dollars in taxes for the wealthy while raising taxes for the middle class.

headline.main: To Obama, Republican Budget Plans Are 'Snake Oil'
